resources.string: Please insert a valid CPR number.

The opening page contains 3 options, START TEST, TEST HISTORY and LOGOUT. START TEST begins the test. TEST HISTORY will show previous attempts. LOGOUT will end the test. 

Follow the onscreen instructions. You are shown a YES and NO option. The sound will play for 3 seconds. Press YES if you hear the sound and NO if you dont. PAUSE should be used if for any reason you need to delay the test. If PAUSE is chosen then the option to CONTINUE and CANCEL are made available. 

Once the test is completed you can choose the option to SEND RESULTS or RESTART the test.

BSquare Hearing Test 

Description: Portable hearing test. 

App created by Arturs, Daniel, Florin, Michelle, Zoltan
Hearing test history data \n\nNr. Date Status
There was an error. Please try again.

Welcome to the BeSquare hearing test. This app contains a portable hearing test designed for various age groups dependant on your entered CPR number. Its aim is to improve the efficency and easy of use for both the patient and hospital. 

The tests are designed to give an accurate hearing measurement, but the measurements are only as reliable as the responses given. Therefore you are asked to take your time and respond to the sounds as honestly and accurately as possible. 

Thank you for your valued support.
In which ear do you hear the sound?
Are you sure you want to stop the hearing test?

Thank you, the hearing test is finished.
